slidingBox.textArea: Mnogo dobre napisan tekst za tova koi i kakvo sum az s koito hvashtam ochite na posetitelite. Dobur poslepis.

event4.description: I came to Denmark with an interest for studying digital marketing, I soon found a passion for Web Development. After graduating I switched to Business Engineering.
